question: Which of the following kings marched towards Kannauj and rescued his sister Rajyashri, who was believed to be on the verge of committing Sati?
explanation: Harshavardhan was only sixteen years of age when he ascended the throne. After accession, he immediately marched towards Kannauj and rescued his sister Rajyashri. Rajyashri was believed to be on the verge of committing Sati.
